text: Hugh Dane (October 21, 1942 â€“ May 16, 2018) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Hank the security guard on the television sitcom The Office from 2005 to 2013. His career began in 1989. He was born in Phoenix, Arizona. Dane died on May 16, 2018, at the age of 75 from pancreatic cancer in Los Angeles, aged 75. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
